result.execSummary:
The defendant Melissa Ann Wigen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "B"], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Payment plan to commence March 1, 2016 at $25.00 per month.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Melissa Ann Wigen

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Fox, ADA:  Matthew L Hartung, DF ATTY:  Joseph R. Caton, DF:  Melissa Ann Wigen appeared. Case called at 10:10 am. ADA Matthew Hartung recites agreement and moves to amend to Disorderly conduct with Domestic Abuse Enhancer STRICKEN. Defendant has completed requirements prior to plea. Victim Rights have been complied with. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads Guilty to Ct 1 - Disorderly conduct W/O Dom. Abuse Enhancer. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 1 W/O Dom. Abuse Enhancer. 
Crt orders: Court costs of $243.00. Defendant to pay $25.00/mo to begin on 3/1/16.
Plea hearing at 12-16-2015 10:00 am
Plea hearing at 12-10-2015 04:30 pm

ADA Hartung updates the court, there are some conditions that need to be met. ADA Hartung requests another 60 days. Atty. Caton agrees. Evaluation to be sealed.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 10, 2015 at 04:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 10-06-2015 11:30 am

Set for a plea and sentencing. ADA Nieskes responds. Address confirmed. Bond continues.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 20, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 29, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Alexis S. Mckinley DF ATTY: Joseph R. Caton DF: Melissa Ann Wigen appeared. Case called at 4:16. ADA Mckinley believes there is an agreement and requests a plea and sentencing date. Atty. Caton agrees. Address confirmed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 29, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
Filed by ADA Hartung. km
Appointing Atty Caton. km
Pre-trial conference on June 1, 2015 at 04:15 pm.

Prior to leaving the courthouse, report to St Croix County Jail for mugshots and fingerprints.

-It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  K.L.E.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.

CO: SRN, RPR: Vicki Kasten, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:  Alexis S. Mckinley,  DF ATTY:  Joseph R. Caton,  DF:  Melissa Ann Wigen appeared. Court confirms address. Defendant does qualify for PD.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial.   State to provide discovery within 20 days and motions within 10 days upon receipt of discovery. Court orders face to face settlement conference before next hearing.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 04:15 pm.
